identificationModule.briefTitle: Risk of Chronic Kidney Disease in Bronchial Asthma
identificationModule.officialTitle: Risk of Developing Chronic Kidney Disease in Patients With Bronchial Asthma at Sohag University Hospitals

responsibleParty.investigatorTitle: doctor resident at pediatric department in sohag university hospitals

descriptionModule.briefSummary: the study aims to determine the frequency and factors associated with chronic kidney disease among asthmatic patients in order to determine persons who are at risk of developing chronic kidney disease and require strict follow up in long run , to evaluate severity of asthma as a potential risk for developing kidney injury , to evaluate relationship between different inflammatory markers with severity of asthma and risk of deneloping chronic kidney disease

armGroups.label: cases ( asthmatic patients)
armGroups.description: asthmatics investigated by serum creatinine , GFR calculation , ESR,CRP,ABG,CBC , serum electrolytes , interleukin6, tumor necrotic factor alpha
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: CBC, CRP ,ESR, ABG , interleukin 6, tumor necrotic factor alpha

armGroups.label: control (healthy persons)
armGroups.description: healthy persons investigated by same investigations and compare results with asthmatics
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: CBC, CRP ,ESR, ABG , interleukin 6, tumor necrotic factor alpha

interventions.name: CBC, CRP ,ESR, ABG , interleukin 6, tumor necrotic factor alpha
interventions.description: compare results of investigations in asthmatics and non asthmatics

primaryOutcomes.measure: change in kidney function in asthmatics
primaryOutcomes.description: change in serum creatinine , GFR calculation
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: change in kidney function in asthmatics after diagnosis and start treatment through out the duration of study (an average 1 year )

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* all children diagnosed as bronchial asthma at sohag university hospitals from age of 2 years to age of 18 years and donot have any associated disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* persons who have any chronic illness persons who have any associated disease with bronchial asthma persons who missing clinical and laboratory investigations persons who refusing to give written informed consent for the study
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: cases (asthmatics) and control ( healthy ) from age of 2 years to 18 years

ancestors.term: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications

browseLeaves.name: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications

browseBranches.name: Urinary Tract, Sexual Organs, and Pregnancy Conditions
